alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 2:33PM EDT until March 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures generally in the 20s to around 30 are expected. * WHERE...Rabun, Habersham, Stephens, Franklin, Hart and Elbert Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 11 AM EDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM Sunday to 10 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens
